definitions.text: a short musical composition with words
examples: a successful musical must have at least three good songs
the song of bullets was in the air
the wheels sang their song as the train rocketed ahead
with a shout and a song they marched up to the gates

definitions.text: the characteristic sound produced by a bird
examples: a bird will not learn its song unless it hears it at an early age
he bought it for a song

definitions.text: the imperial dynasty of China from 960 to 1279; noted for art and literature and philosophy
